section.title: Software License Terms
section.bridgehead: Part 1: HPE End User License Agreement
section.para: The end user license agreement is provided at the time of purchase.
Additional license authorizations for are available at: http://docs.hpcloud.com/pdf/static/HPE_HOS_5.0_ALA_May2017.pdf.
section.bridgehead: Part 3: Open Source and Third Party License Terms
section.para: License information related to ancillary, third party, and open source software components are available at: http://docs.hpcloud.com/pdf/static/HPE_HOS_5.0_OpenSource_and_3rd_Party_Licenses.pdf.
